title: The $90 Billion Squeeze: What the Triad's Budget Really Means for Your Capture Strategy
description: Two massive funding streams converge at the exact moment the Pentagon is tearing up its acquisition rulebook. The $40.5B DHP budget alongside the new $50B Rural Health Transformation Program. Here's what it means for contractors.

title: The MHS Triad Part 2: The Capability Stack
description: H2F proves the doctrine works: 35% fewer injuries, 37% fewer suicides. We cover the telehealth landscape, what's missing (enterprise RPM, the Oura disaster), and what it means for contractors, beneficiaries, and warfighters.

title: The MHS Triad Part 1: Meet the Three Leaders Who Will Reshape Military Medicine
description: Keith Bass, Emil Michael, and Admiral Darin Via. The new MHS command structure is set. If you're not paying attention, you're going to get left behind. Here's the strategic context and what each leader brings.

title: We're the Department of War Now
description: EO 14347 authorized the Pentagon to use 'Department of War' as a secondary title. Defense.gov redirects to war.gov. This isn't just optics—it's doctrine. What it means for MHS and the mission shift to combat readiness.

title: The Audit Mandate: Why Everything Has to Work Now
description: DoD must achieve a clean audit opinion by December 31, 2028. Section 1002 of FY2026 NDAA gives this mandate teeth: SES firing authority for audit failures. Why MHS GENESIS isn't optional and what it means for wearables.

title: The Oura Disaster: Why the $96M Wearables Deal Died
description: The contract didn't die because WHOOP filed a protest. It died because DHA couldn't audit the data. The next solicitation will require Audit-Ready Data Architecture as table stakes. Lessons for anyone pitching wearables.

title: Human Performance Optimization: Via's Vision for the Human Weapon System
description: Admiral Via coined the term 'Human Weapon System.' This isn't healthcare—it's cognitive enhancement, nutritional optimization, and sleep resilience. How H2F proves the model and why SANTOS matters for simulation.

title: GenAI.mil: Emil Michael's AI Push and the China Decoupling
description: On December 9, Michael launched GenAI.mil—putting Google's Gemini for Government on every DoD desktop. 3 million users, every classification level. Plus: the university war and Section 223's research security mandate.
